nodes.text: The Gungan Staff was a staff owned by Boss Rugor Nass, who led the Gungan species from the city of Otoh Gunga during the Invasion of Naboo, the Gungan homeworld, in 32 BBY.  The staff was black and had two triangular supporting branches at the bottom, which had holes next to the body of the staff. The top of the staff held a roughly circular shape with symmetrical holes throughout it.
The Gungan Staff appeared as an accessory for the Boss Nass action figure released through Hasbro's 1999 Star Wars: Episode I toy line.
